description: A protocol entity contains information about an intended protocol that was followed in the project.
title: protocol_core

$schema.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

schema_type.description: The type of the metadata schema entity.

protocol_id.description: A unique ID for this protocol.

protocol_name.description: A short, descriptive name for the protocol that need not be unique.

protocol_description.description: A general description of the protocol.

doi.description: The publication digital object identifier (doi) associated with the protocol.

pdf.description: A filename of a PDF containing the details of the protocol.

retail_name.description: The retail name of the protocol kit used.

batch_number.description: The batch of protocol kit used.
